summary:
Fox News is an American conservative news channel and website. It was started in 1996 by Rupert Murdoch to attract conservative viewers. The channel is very popular and is watched by millions of people in the U.S. and around the world.

Some people think Fox News is biased and favors the Republican Party. They say it sometimes reports false information. In 2023, Fox News had to pay a lot of money to a company called Dominion because they said wrong things about the 2020 election. Despite this, many Republicans still trust Fox News.
title: Fox News
